name: Aha Exfoliating Cream
superIngr: Organic Green Tea Leaf and Organic Bilberry Fruit Extracts
Organic Shea Butter and Mango Butter
prodHighlight: Suitable for more sensitive skin while still providing both chemical and physical exfoliation.
Worry-free Jojoba Wax Beads eliminate the need for environmentally damaging plastic microbeads; more Jojoba Beads can be added to suit customer needs.
The cream base leaves skin more hydrated and feeling softer than an exfoliator alone.
Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) provide chemical exfoliation with the inclusion of Glycolic, Tartaric, and Malic Acids.
Match with other gentle chemical exfoliators to complete a once-weekly routine.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: Apply a dab of cream on damp skin. Uniformly massage into your skin, paying close attention to areas of congestion or dryness. Moisten fingertips with warm water and massage again. Rinse with warm water until all product is removed and pat dry. Use 1-2 times per week. External use only.
prodDirec: Apply a dab of cream on damp skin. Uniformly massage into your skin, paying close attention to areas of congestion or dryness. Moisten fingertips with warm water and massage again. Rinse with warm water until all product is removed and pat dry. Use 1-2 times per week. External use only.
prodIngr: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Organic Palm Fruit Oil (Elaeis Guineensis), Jojoba Esters (Hydrogenated Simmondsia Chinensis Oil), Apricot Kernel Oil (Prunus Armeniaca), Emulsifying Wax (Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60), Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Phenoxyethanol, Organic Green Tea Leaf Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Organic Sugar Cane Extract (Saccharum Officinarum), Organic Bilberry Fruit Extract (Vaccinium Myrtillus), Organic Sugar Maple Extract (Acer Saccharinum), Organic Orange Peel Extract (Citrus Sinensis), Organic Lemon Peel Extract (Citrus Limon), Organic Cranberry Fruit Extract (Vaccinium Macrocarpon), Glycolic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Malic Acid, Mango Seed Butter (Mangifera Indica), Organic Shea Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii), Organic White Willow Bark Extract (Salix Alba), Organic Neem Seed Oil (Melia Azadirachta), Organic Rosemary Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis), Organic Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Organic Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate

name: Blood Orange Resurface Scrub
superIngr: AHA bundle of Glycolic, Tartaric, Malic, Lactic, and Citric Acids
prodHighlight: For complete exfoliation that is gentle on your skin, this scrub uses very fine-grained Walnut Shell Powder to remove dead cells and reveal soft, smooth skin on your body.
Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) provide chemical exfoliation, helping cells refresh and look rejuvenated once the physical exfoliation is complete.
Organic Aloe Leaf Juice and Organic Jojoba Oil moisturize and nourish skin to maintain suppleness after exfoliation.
Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein helps to condition and soothe.
Rosehip Seed Oil and Walnut are loaded with antioxidants, helping skin both look and feel refreshed.
Suitable for use on the body (not more delicate facial skin) in gentle motions.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, excluding sensitive.
warnings: Only to be used on the body, not the face. For external use only. Do not ingest. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: This gentle exfoliating treatment formulated with a powerful mixture of key ingredients like walnut shell powder, aloe, jojoba, willow bark, glycerin, vitamin E, and glycolic acid resurfaces and rejuvenates the skin for a beautiful glow.
prodDirec: Scoop between fingers, apply to wet skin to create a light foam and gently massage in a circular motion, focusing on rough areas. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry. Follow with light moisturizer if needed. Use 2-3 times weekly. Not recommended for the face.
prodIngr: Walnut Shell Powder (Juglans Regia), Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Decyl Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Organic Lavender Flower Water (Lavandula Angustifolia), Roman Chamomile Flower Water (Anthemis Nobilis), Glycerin, Organic Jojoba Seed Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis), Rosehip Seed Oil (Rosa Canina), Organic Oatstraw Extract (Avena Sativa), Organic White Willow Bark Extract (Salix Alba), Glycolic Acid, Malic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Provitamin B5 (DL-Panthenol), Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Blood Orange Oil (Citrus Sinensis), Peppermint Oil (Mentha Piperita), Xanthan Gum, Organic Alcohol, Tetrasodium EDTA

name: Calming Lavender Facial Toner
superIngr: Lavender, Chamomile, and Tea Tree Essential Oils
prodHighlight: Formulated with both German and Roman Chamomile Essential Oils.
Includes Organic Aloe for a soothing boost, and the relaxing aroma of Lavender Essential Oil.
Contains cleansing Tea Tree Essential Oil to assist troubled complexions.
Relaxing and calming lavender & chamomile aroma make this excellent in a night routine or spa treatment.
Balances pH.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and mature skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: This soothing, calming and balancing toner is specifically created for sensitive skin. Formulated with relaxing scent of Lavender and Chamomile, with supportive MSM, cleansing Tea Tree and clarifying Organic White Willow Bark, all in a gentle base of Organic Aloe.
prodDirec: After cleansing the face, apply a moderate amount of toner to a cotton pad and gently apply all over the face in upward motions (alternatively, close your eyes and spray directly on the face). Allow it to dry and follow with NuVitta Multivitamin Facial Serum or NuVitta Nourishing Night Cream for the best results. External use only.
prodIngr: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Lavender Flower Oil (Lavandula Angustifolia), German Chamomile Flower Oil (Chamomilla Recutita), Roman Chamomile Flower Oil (Anthemis Nobilis), Tea Tree Leaf Oil (Melaleuca Alternifolia), MSM (Dimethyl Sulfone), Organic White Willow Bark Extract (Salix Alba), Polysorbate 20, Polysorbate 80, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate

name: Citrus Gel Facial Cleanser
prodHighlight: Excellent glide leaves skin silky-soft while allowing smaller portions per use.
Does quadruple duty: facial cleanser, shower gel, hand wash, or even bubble bath.
Organic Aloe and Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein help soothe and nourish skin during and after cleansing.
Pro-Vitamin B5 helps moisturize and rejuvenate.
Tea Tree Leaf Oil provides thorough cleansing to remove any impurities.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: This clear facial gel cleanser will help soothe and nourish your skin during and after cleansing. Glides easily over the skin, leaving it silky-soft, richly conditioned, and pH balanced. Perfect for normal to combination skin types that want a foaming lather while nourishing skin.
prodDirec: Cleanse your face and neck every morning and night in circular motions in an upward direction. You do not need to use anything but your hands; washcloths are optional. External use only.
prodIngr: Aloe barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, DL-Panthenol, Melaleuca alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Citrus Paradisi (Pink Grapefruit) Essential Oil, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Essential Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Essential Oil, Litsea Cubeba (Litsea) Fruit Essential Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Mandarin) Essential Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Sweet Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus sinensis (Blood Orange) Essential Oil

prodHighlight: Formulated to soothe and calm distressed or sensitive skin.,
Includes soothing Organic Aloe and crisp, refreshing Cucumber Distillate.
Contains cleansing Tea Tree Essential oil to assist troubled complexions.
Delightful and luxurious natural cucumber aroma.

warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Made with the delicious scent of cucumber fruit water, organic aloe leaf juice and tea tree leaf oil to give your skin the perfect rejuvenating experience. name: Day & Night Hydrating Cream
superIngr: Organic White Willow Bark, Rosemary, and Neem Extracts
prodHighlight: Formulated to help restore balance and moisture to the skin.
Perfect antioxidant and toning solution for any skincare regimen, especially for mature skin.
Contains Organic Jojoba Oil, which virtually mirrors the skin's own natural oils.
Includes toning Vegan DMAE, which can help improve the appearance of chaotic and maturing skin.
Added moisture-boosting OptiMSM.
Scented with Orange Wild, Lavender and Geranium Essential Oils.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product. Although suitable for most skin types, DMAE can cause a tingling sensation so a patch test is recommended for those with sensitive skin.
prodDesc: A luxuriously rich cream that brings dramatic results to all skin types: in particular, sensitive, dry, mature, and stressed skin. Offers an intense hydration with organic coconut, jojoba oil, meadowfoam seed oil, and avocado oil. The vegan minerals DMAE and Opti MSM™ help firm and revive skin tone and texture.
prodDirec: Moisturize your face and neck every morning and night, after you cleanse and tone. Always moisturize your face and neck in upward motions. Avoid direct contact with eyes. External use only.
prodIngr: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Organic Coconut Oil (Cocos Nucifera), DMAE Bitartrate (Dimethylaminoethanol Bitartrate), Emulsifying Wax (Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60), Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Organic Jojoba Seed Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis), Meadowfoam Seed Oil (Limnanthes Alba), Avocado Fruit Oil (Persea Gratissima), Witch Hazel Water (Hamamelis Virginiana), Organic Orange Wild (Citrus Sinensis) Essential Oil, Organic Lavender (Lavandula Angustifolia) Essential Oil, Organic Geranium (Pelargonium Graveolens) Essential Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), MSM (Dimethyl Sulfone), Organic White Willow Bark Extract (Salix Alba), Organic Neem Seed Oil (Melia Azadirachta), Organic Rosemary Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis), Organic Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Organic Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate.

name: Firming Eye Cream
prodHighlight: Decrease the appearance of fine lines
Boost hydration and leave your eye area firmer
Soothe and protect
Improve elasticity
Restores radiance and glow
skinType: An effective choice for combination, oily, mature skin types – or anyone noticing deeper wrinkles.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs have been applied with sunscreen. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency and duration In the beginning.
prodDesc: A highly advanced formulation combines the cutting-edge technology of Matrixyl 3000 with Peptides and Lactic and Glycolic Acids to rejuvenate, repair and soothe fragile skin around the eye. Combined with dozens of botanicals, pure plant oils and vitamins and minerals, this firming cream will leave your eye area soft and hydrated with the look of fine lines and wrinkles minimized.
prodDirec: After cleansing, lightly pat a small amount around the eye area and allow time for absorption. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs have been applied with sunscreen. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency and duration. External use only.

name: Makeup CLeansing Oil
prodHighlight: Loaded with antioxidants and vitamins, this oil cleanser contains Grapeseed Oil, Organic Sunflower Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Pumpkin Seed Oil, and Avocado Oil.
Wipes away makeup and cleans without stripping the skin of its natural oils.
Delivers antioxidants and protects from free radical damage.
Brightens complexion and evens out skin tone.
Promotes scar and wound healing.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, including dry, normal, oily, and even acne-prone skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: This oil-based formula uses gentle cleansing agents to remove impurities without disturbing skin's natural barrier function, and an exclusive blend of Grape Seed and Pumpkin Oils to help dissolve all types of makeup. Skin is left refreshed with a clean, soft finish that lasts all day.
prodDirec: Apply a dime sized amount to a cotton round and gently wipe away mascara and makeup debris. This can be done before or after cleansing the face and when the skin is either wet or dry. When makeup is emulsified, rinse with warm water or finish with an additional cleanse.
prodIngr: Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Organic Sunflower) Seed Oil, Oryza sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Di-PPG-2 Myreth-10 Adipate, Cucurbita Pepo (pumpkin) seed oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil.

name: Multivitamin Facial Serum
superIngr: Vitamins A, C, B3, B5, and E
prodHighlight: Formulated for mature skin to tone, balance, and replenish.
Includes powerful and essential CoQ10, as well as tonifying DMAE.
Super silky and soft texture and finish.
Naturally and beautifully colored and has a very subtle Rose scent.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, but targeted for mature skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.

It helps fight the signs of aging and protects the skin from free radical damage through infusion of natural AHA acids, antioxidants, vitamins, and humectants.
prodDirec: Apply 1-2 pumps morning and/or evening after cleansing and toning and before your regular moisturizer. This hydrating serum is perfect for delicate eye area and an additional eye cream is not necessary. External use only.

Can be used for face, hair and body.
Made from 100% olive-derived squalane.
Boosts moisture retention and helps diminish the appearance of fine lines, improving overall complexion.

name: Vitamin C Cream
prodHighlight: Vitamin C may help repair and prevent fine lines and ultraviolet damage, while reducing inflammation and other irritants.

Vitamin E is known for its skin-healing properties and is an essential antioxidant for healthy skin. It also helps protect skin cells from free radical damage, while serving as an anti-inflammatory agent.
Vitamin B5 helps keep skin soft, smooth and healthy.
Jojoba Oil is used to nourish and heal skin without clogging pores.
Shea Butter leaves skin nourished and moisturized and is rich in vitamins and minerals and is known to promote healthy, radiant skin.
Green Tea is known for its antioxidant properties, may help protect healthy skin from harmful free radicals that could cause premature aging.
skinType: A great daily moisturizer for all skin types.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: A supercharged moisturizer that delivers up to 24 hours of hydration and minimizes fine lines while leaving a dewy glow that looks great under makeup. A powerful punch of 15% Vitamin C works to lighten hyperpigmentation and protect skin from free radicals.
prodDirec: Apply in a light circular motion to freshly cleansed and toned face, neck and décolleté areas. Can be used in the morning and evening. Will moisturize and protect normal, dry, and dehydrated skin. External use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.
prodIngr: Aqua (Deionized Water), Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Organic Sunflower), Isopropyl Palmitate (Palm Oil), Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Dimethyl Sulfone (MSM), Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Simmondsia Chinensis Seed (Organic Jojoba) Oil, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Camellia Sinensis Leaf (Green Tea) Extract, Centella Asiatica (Organic Gotu Kola) Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Geranium Maculatum (Wild Geranium) Extract, Taraxacum Officinale (Dandelion) Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol.

name: Wild Orange Face Oil
superIngr: Chia Seed and Camellia Seed Oils
Tomato Seed and Cranberry Seed Oils
Jasmine Grandiflorum Absolute and Rose Absolute
prodHighlight: A beautiful bright orange color is derived from CoQ10 and antioxidant-heavy Seabuckthorn Berry Oil
Dose skin with our favorite array of fatty acids from Chia Seed and Camellia Seed Oils
Moisturize and tone skin with Organic Jojoba Oil and Daikon Seed Extract
Jasmine Grandiflorum Absolute and Rose Absolute create an enticing and luxurious scent
Suitable as a facial serum, body oil, or taming hair oil and ideal for premium-focused lines
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, but designed for maturing skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: A nourishing face oil that helps improve and hydrate the skin. Premium ingredients are combined with delicate jasmine and rose scents for a luxurious oil designed to give high doses of antioxidants, fatty acids, and hydration.
prodDirec: Apply a small amount to clean damp skin as needed and massage into skin until absorbed. Can also be used on hair and as a night oil. External use only.
prodIngr:
Jojoba (Simmondsia chinensis) Oil, Daikon (Raphanus) Seed Extract, * Chia (Salvia hispanica) Seed Oil, * Camellia (Camellia oleifera) Oil, Tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cranberry (Vaccinium macrocarpon) Oil, Sunflower (Helianthus annuus) Oil, * Seabuckthorn (Hippophae rhamnoides) Berry, Jasmine Grandiflorum (Jasminum grandiflorum) Absolute, Rose (Rosa damascena) Absolute, Coenzyme Q10 (Ubidecarenone), Vitamin E (Tocopherol) Oil 
 *Certified Organic Ingredients
